turns.utterance: hi, how are you doing today?
turns.response: not much , i am still at school . i am hoping to become an artist you ?

turns.utterance: not too bad.  i have never really studied art.  are you good at art?
turns.response: i bet ! what do you do on your spare time ?

turns.utterance: thats great!  on my spare time i like to read.  do you read?
turns.response: how are you ? tell me about your dad ! mine is a bartender

turns.utterance: i am good.  my dad is dead.
turns.response: almost everything in my room is blue , it happens to be my favourite color .

turns.utterance: good change of topic.  my favorite color is blue, too.

phrase: you arent staying on topic at all.
